Symbol.Script_3D:
! Text 3D
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_OFF THEN END IF gs_shadow=0 THEN SHADOW OFF
PEN gs_cont_pen MATERIAL mat1 RESOL gs_resol
!!! ***************** !!! *************************************** !!! 3D MODEL !!! *************************************** !!! ***************** !!! ***************************************
rotz rotAngleZ IF GLOB_CONTEXT>20 AND GLOB_CONTEXT<40 THEN
ROTX -90 + rotAngleX ROTY -rotAngleY ADDy -B BLOCK A,B,ZZYZX DEL 3 ELSE
TextWidth = STW (f)/1000 IF gs_CustomWidth = 1 THEN MULx A/TextWidth
ROTX rotAngleX ROTZ rotAngleY ADDy ZZYZX TEXT B, 0, f DEL 3
IF gs_CustomWidth = 1 THEN DEL 1
ENDIF
!!! **************** !!! **************************************** !!! HOTSPOTS !!! **************************************** !!! **************** !!! ****************************************
unID=1 ROTX -90 + rotAngleX ROTY -rotAngleY
!!! *** HEIGHT HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID,ZZYZX,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,0,-1,unID,ZZYZX,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,0,ZZYZX,unID,ZZYZX,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A,0,0,unID,ZZYZX,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,0,-1,unID,ZZYZX,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,0,ZZYZX,unID,ZZYZX,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,-B,0,unID,ZZYZX,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,-B,-1,unID,ZZYZX,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0,-B,ZZYZX,unID,ZZYZX,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A,-B,0,unID,ZZYZX,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,-B,-1,unID,ZZYZX,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,-B,ZZYZX,unID,ZZYZX,2 : unID=unID+1
!! *** THICKNESS HOTSPOT A/2,0,0,unID,B,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2,1,0,unID,B,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2,-B,0,unID,B,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT A/2,0,ZZYZX,unID,B,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2,1,ZZYZX,unID,B,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2,-B,ZZYZX,unID,B,2 : unID=unID+1
!!! *** LENGTH IF gs_CustomWidth=1 THEN HOTSPOT 0,0,0,unID,A,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,0,0,unID,A,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,0,0,unID,A,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,0,ZZYZX,unID,A,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,0,ZZYZX,unID,A,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,0,ZZYZX,unID,A,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,-B,0,unID,A,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,-B,0,unID,A,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,-B,0,unID,A,2 : unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0,-B,ZZYZX,unID,A,1+256 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1,-B,ZZYZX,unID,A,3 : unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A,-B,ZZYZX,unID,A,2 : unID=unID+1 ENDIF
DEL 2 ! rot x & y del 1 ! rot z
end
Symbol.Script_2D:
!!! ***************** !!! *************************************** !!! 2D SYMBOL !!! *************************************** !!! ***************** !!! ***************************************
PEN gs_cont_pen
IF bShow2D THEN
IF gs_ProjectFill = 0 THEN project2{3} 3, 270, 32+3, 15 parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_DETAILED ELSE SET FILL gs_fill_type project2{3} 3, 270, 32+3, 15, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 90 parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_DETAILED ENDIF
HOTLINE2 _point1X, _point1Y, _point5X, _point5Y HOTLINE2 _point2X, _point2Y, _point6X, _point6Y HOTLINE2 _point3X, _point3Y, _point7X, _point7Y HOTLINE2 _point4X, _point4Y, _point8X, _point8Y
ELSE rot2 rotAngleZ
IF rotAngleX >= 0 AND rotAngleX < 90 THEN if rotAngleY >= 0 then if rotAngleY <= 90 then LINE2 _point8X, _point8Y, _point4X, _point4Y LINE2 _point8X, _point8Y, _point6X, _point6Y LINE2 _point8X, _point8Y, _point7X, _point7Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, -1 else LINE2 _point6X, _point6Y, _point2X, _point2Y LINE2 _point6X, _point6Y, _point5X, _point5Y LINE2 _point6X, _point6Y, _point8X, _point8Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, -1 endif else if rotAngleY >= -90 then LINE2 _point4X, _point4Y, _point2X, _point2Y LINE2 _point4X, _point4Y, _point3X, _point3Y LINE2 _point4X, _point4Y, _point8X, _point8Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, -1 else LINE2 _point2X, _point2Y, _point1X, _point1Y LINE2 _point2X, _point2Y, _point4X, _point4Y LINE2 _point2X, _point2Y, _point6X, _point6Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, -1 endif endif ENDIF
IF rotAngleX >= 90 AND rotAngleX < 180 THEN if rotAngleY >= 0 then if rotAngleY <= 90 then LINE2 _point7X, _point7Y, _point3X, _point3Y LINE2 _point7X, _point7Y, _point5X, _point5Y LINE2 _point7X, _point7Y, _point8X, _point8Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, -1 else LINE2 _point5X, _point5Y, _point1X, _point1Y LINE2 _point5X, _point5Y, _point6X, _point6Y LINE2 _point5X, _point5Y, _point7X, _point7Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, -1 endif else if rotAngleY >= -90 then LINE2 _point3X, _point3Y, _point1X, _point1Y LINE2 _point3X, _point3Y, _point4X, _point4Y LINE2 _point3X, _point3Y, _point7X, _point7Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, -1 else LINE2 _point1X, _point1Y, _point2X, _point2Y LINE2 _point1X, _point1Y, _point3X, _point3Y LINE2 _point1X, _point1Y, _point5X, _point5Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, -1 endif endif ENDIF
IF rotAngleX >= 180 AND rotAngleX < 270 THEN if rotAngleY >= 0 then if rotAngleY <= 90 then LINE2 _point1X, _point1Y, _point2X, _point2Y LINE2 _point1X, _point1Y, _point3X, _point3Y LINE2 _point1X, _point1Y, _point5X, _point5Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, -1 else LINE2 _point3X, _point3Y, _point1X, _point1Y LINE2 _point3X, _point3Y, _point4X, _point4Y LINE2 _point3X, _point3Y, _point7X, _point7Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, -1 endif else if rotAngleY >= -90 then LINE2 _point5X, _point5Y, _point1X, _point1Y LINE2 _point5X, _point5Y, _point6X, _point6Y LINE2 _point5X, _point5Y, _point7X, _point7Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, -1 else LINE2 _point7X, _point7Y, _point3X, _point3Y LINE2 _point7X, _point7Y, _point5X, _point5Y LINE2 _point7X, _point7Y, _point8X, _point8Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, -1 endif endif ENDIF
IF rotAngleX >= 270 AND rotAngleX <= 360 THEN if rotAngleY >= 0 then if rotAngleY <= 90 then LINE2 _point2X, _point2Y, _point1X, _point1Y LINE2 _point2X, _point2Y, _point4X, _point4Y LINE2 _point2X, _point2Y, _point6X, _point6Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, -1 else LINE2 _point4X, _point4Y, _point2X, _point2Y LINE2 _point4X, _point4Y, _point3X, _point3Y LINE2 _point4X, _point4Y, _point8X, _point8Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, -1 endif else if rotAngleY >= -90 then LINE2 _point6X, _point6Y, _point2X, _point2Y LINE2 _point6X, _point6Y, _point5X, _point5Y LINE2 _point6X, _point6Y, _point8X, _point8Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point1X, _point1Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point8X, _point8Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point1X, _point1Y, -1 else LINE2 _point8X, _point8Y, _point4X, _point4Y LINE2 _point8X, _point8Y, _point6X, _point6Y LINE2 _point8X, _point8Y, _point7X, _point7Y
FILL gs_fill_type POLY2_B 7, 1+2+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, _point2X, _point2Y, 1, _point4X, _point4Y, 1, _point3X, _point3Y, 1, _point7X, _point7Y, 1, _point5X, _point5Y, 1, _point6X, _point6Y, 1, _point2X, _point2Y, -1 endif endif ENDIF ENDIF
!!! **************** !!! **************************************** !!! HOTSPOTS !!! **************************************** !!! **************** !!! ****************************************
unID=1
! --- Corners --- hotspot2 _point1X, _point1Y, unID : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 _point2X, _point2Y, unID : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 _point3X, _point3Y, unID : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 _point4X, _point4Y, unID : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 _point5X, _point5Y, unID : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 _point6X, _point6Y, unID : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 _point7X, _point7Y, unID : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 _point8X, _point8Y, unID : unID = unID + 1
! --- Center --- hotspot2 _point5X / 2, _point5Y / 2, unID : unID = unID + 1
del not(bShow2D) * 1
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: iTextFaceCode FACECODE_NORMAL = 0 FACECODE_BOLD = 1 FACECODE_ITALIC = 2
! const values for parameter: gs_detlevel_3D_m DLEV3D_OFF = 0 DLEV3D_SIMPLE = 1 DLEV3D_DETAILED = 2 DLEV3D_DRAFT = 3
EPS=0.0001
DEFINE STYLE "your text" fontType ,zzyzx*1000,1, iTextFaceCode SET STYLE "your text"
IF gs_CustomWidth = 0 THEN parameters A = STW(f) / 1000 lock "A" ELSE A = A parameters A = A ENDIF
_point1X = 0 _point2X = 0 _point3X = ZZYZX * sin(-rotAngleY) _point4X = ZZYZX * sin(-rotAngleY) _point5X = _point1X + A * cos(-rotAngleY) _point6X = _point2X + A * cos(-rotAngleY) _point7X = _point3X + A * cos(-rotAngleY) _point8X = _point4X + A * cos(-rotAngleY)
_point1Y = 0 _point2Y = B * cos(90 + rotAngleX) _point3Y = ZZYZX * cos(rotAngleX) * cos(-rotAngleY) _point4Y = _point3Y + (_point2Y - _point1Y) _point5Y = A * sin(rotAngleY) * cos(rotAngleX) _point6Y = _point2Y + (_point5Y - _point1Y) _point7Y = _point3Y + (_point5Y - _point1Y) _point8Y = _point4Y + (_point5Y - _point1Y)
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types" parameters all
!Hide all parameters from UI hideparameter all "A", "B", "ZZYZX"
values{2} "gs_detlevel_3D_m" DLEV3D_DETAILED, `Детальный`, DLEV3D_OFF, `Откл.` values{2} "iTextFaceCode" FACECODE_NORMAL, `Обычный`, FACECODE_BOLD, `Жирный`, FACECODE_ITALIC, `Курсив` VALUES "rotAngleX" RANGE [0, 360] VALUES "rotAngleY" RANGE [-180, 180] VALUES "rotAngleZ" RANGE [0, 360] VALUES "gs_resol" RANGE [3, ) VALUES "A" RANGE (0, ) VALUES "B" RANGE (0, ) VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE (0, )
IF gs_cont_pen = 0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_cont_pen = 2 IF gs_fill_pen = 0 THEN PARAMETERS gs_fill_pen = 91
IF not(bShow2D) THEN HIDEPARAMETER "gs_ProjectFill" IF bShow2D THEN HIDEPARAMETER "gs_fill_pen" IF bShow2D AND gs_ProjectFill=0 THEN HIDEPARAMETER "gs_fill_type","gs_back_pen"
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_OFF THEN HIDEPARAMETER "gs_shadow", "gs_resol"
PARAMETERS gs_font_size = abs(gs_font_size) VALUES "gs_font_size" range (0, ]
Symbol.Script_UI:
! ============================================================================= ! Tabpage Structure Definition ! ============================================================================= TABID_Root =-1 _idxTab = 1 TABID_Style = _idxTab : _idxTab = _idxTab + 1 TABID_Descriptions = _idxTab : _idxTab = _idxTab + 1
! ============================================================================= ! Display actual tabpages ! ============================================================================= ui_dialog `Параметры 3D-текста` ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
ui_page TABID_Style, TABID_Root, `Стиль, Отображение и Покрытия`, "uiTab_Style_flat(1)" gosub "Stylepage"
ui_page TABID_Descriptions, TABID_Root, `Характеристики`, "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)" gosub "Descriptionspage"
! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Image links for archive ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- file_dependence "uiTab_Style_flat(1)" file_dependence "uiTab_Descriptions_flat(1)"
! ============================================================================== end ! ==============================================================================
! ============================================================================== !Subroutines ! ==============================================================================
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "Stylepage": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ _idx = 1 dim paramNameReprArray[] dim childFlagReprArray[] dim iconNameReprArray[]
paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "F" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "fontType" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "iTextFaceCode" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_CustomWidth" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "rotAngleX" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "rotAngleY" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "rotAngleZ" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_2D_representation" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "bShow2D" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_detailLevel2D_flat(1)"
if bShow2D then _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_ProjectFill" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_detailLevel2D_flat(1)" endif
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_cont_pen" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)"
if gs_ProjectFill then _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_fill_type" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)"
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_fill_pen" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)"
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_back_pen" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)" endif
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_3D_representation" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_detlevel_3D_m" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_detailLevel3D_flat(1)"
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_DETAILED then _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_resol" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_resol_flat(1)" endif
if gs_detlevel_3D_m <> DLEV3D_OFF then _idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_shadow" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_shadow_flat(1)" endif
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "gs_material" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 0 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = ""
_idx = _idx + 1 paramNameReprArray [_idx] = "mat1" childFlagReprArray [_idx] = 1 iconNameReprArray [_idx] = "ui_list_surface_flat(1)"
file_dependence "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillType_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_fillBgPen_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_detailLevel3D_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_resol_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_shadow_flat(1)" file_dependence "ui_list_surface_flat(1)"
call "ui_object_Representation" parameters all listFieldID = TABID_Style, paramNameArray = paramNameReprArray, childFlagArray = childFlagReprArray, iconNameArray = iconNameReprArray
return
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ "Descriptionspage": ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ dim stParamNames[16] stParamNames[1] = "gs_list_cost" stParamNames[2] = "gs_list_manufacturer" stParamNames[3] = "gs_list_note" stParamNames[4] = "gs_list_location" stParamNames[5] = "gs_list_accessories" stParamNames[6] = "FM_Type" stParamNames[7] = "FM_InventoryNumber" stParamNames[8] = "FM_SerialNumber" stParamNames[9] = "FM_ProductionYear" stParamNames[10] = "FM_ObjectWeight" stParamNames[11] = "FM_ObjectWeightUnit" stParamNames[12] = "gs_list_custom1" stParamNames[13] = "gs_list_custom2" stParamNames[14] = "gs_list_custom3" stParamNames[15] = "gs_list_custom4" stParamNames[16] = "gs_list_custom5"
call "ui_object_listing" parameters all listfieldID = TABID_Descriptions, listFieldPosY = 0, listFieldHeight = 265, stDescHeader = "", stValueHeader = "", stParamNames = stParamNames
return
